1 import rospy
2 from turtlesim.msg import Pose
3 from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist
4 from math import pow, atan2, sqrt
5 from flipBot2 import pair
6 
7 import math
8 import time
9 target = 75
10 class FlipBot:
11  def __init__(self,bot_index:int):
12  self.bot_index=bot_index
13  self.velocity_publisher = rospy.Publisher(
14  '/robot'+str(self.bot_index)+'/flipkart_drive_controller/cmd_vel', Twist, queue_size=10)
15  self.pose_subscriber = rospy.Subscriber(
16  '/flipbot'+str(self.bot_index)+'/pose', Pose, self.update_pose)
17  self.pose = Pose()
18  self.rate = rospy.Rate(10)
19  self.r2 = rospy.Rate(5)
20  self.yaw = 0
21  self.rotate_tolerance= 4
22  def direction(self,boolean:bool):
23  if boolean:
24  return 1
25  else:
26  return -1
27  def update_pose(self,data:float):
28  self.pose = data
29  self.pose.x = round(self.pose.x, 4)
30  self.pose.y = round(self.pose.y, 4)
31  self.pose.theta = round(data.theta,2)
32  def euclidean_distance(self, goal_pose):
33  return sqrt(pow((goal_pose.y - self.pose.y), 2))
34  def linear_vel(self, goal_pose, constant=0.5):
35  return constant * self.euclidean_distance(goal_pose)
36  def euclidean_distance_x(self, goal_pose):
37  return sqrt(pow((goal_pose.x - self.pose.x), 2))
38  def linear_vel_x(self, goal_pose, constant=0.5):
39  return constant * self.euclidean_distance_x(goal_pose)
40 
41  def steering_angle_x(self, goal_pose):
42  return atan2(goal_pose.y - self.pose.y, goal_pose.x - self.pose.x)
43  def angular_vel_x(self, goal_pose, constant=0.05):
44  rospy.loginfo("Current angle --> %f required angular velocity --> %f",self.pose.theta,(self.steering_angle_x(goal_pose) - self.pose.theta)*0.05)
45  return constant * (self.steering_angle_x(goal_pose) - self.pose.theta)
46 
47  def steering_angle_y(self, goal_pose):
48  return atan2( goal_pose.y - self.pose.y,goal_pose.x - self.pose.x)
49  def angular_vel_y(self, goal_pose, constant=0.05):
50  rospy.loginfo("Current angle --> %f required angular velocity --> %f",self.pose.theta,((self.steering_angle_y(goal_pose) - self.pose.theta)-0.17)*0.05)
51  return constant * (self.steering_angle_y(goal_pose) - self.pose.theta)
52 
53  def check_angle(self,target_angle:float):
54  time.sleep(0.2)
55  if(math.degrees(self.pose.theta)>target_angle-self.rotate_tolerance and math.degrees(self.pose.theta)<target_angle+self.rotate_tolerance):
56  return True
57  else:
58  return False
59 
60  def move_y(self,pair:pair,direction:bool):
61  goal_pose = Pose()
62  goal_pose.x = pair.x
63  goal_pose.y = pair.y
64  distance_tolerance = 0.09
65  vel_msg = Twist()
66  while self.euclidean_distance(goal_pose) >= distance_tolerance:
67  vel_msg.linear.x = self.linear_vel(goal_pose)*self.direction(direction)
68  rospy.loginfo("linear velocity Move y --> %f goal distance --> %f",vel_msg.linear.x,self.euclidean_distance(goal_pose))
69  vel_msg.linear.y = 0
70  vel_msg.linear.z = 0
71  # Angular velocity in the z-axis.
72  vel_msg.angular.x = 0
73  vel_msg.angular.y = 0
74  vel_msg.angular.z = 0
75  # Publishing our vel_msg
76  self.velocity_publisher.publish(vel_msg)
77  # Publish at the desired rate.
78  self.rate.sleep()
79  # Stopping our robot after the movement is over.
80  vel_msg.linear.x = 0
81  vel_msg.angular.z = 0
82  self.velocity_publisher.publish(vel_msg)
83  self.velocity_publisher.publish(vel_msg)
84  self.velocity_publisher.publish(vel_msg)
85 
86  # If we press control + C, the node will stop.
87 
88  def move_x(self,pair:pair,direction:bool):
89  """Moves the turtle to the goal."""
90  goal_pose = Pose()
91  goal_pose.x = pair.x
92  goal_pose.y = pair.y
93  distance_tolerance = 0.05
94  vel_msg = Twist()
95  while self.euclidean_distance_x(goal_pose) >= distance_tolerance:
96  # Porportional controller.
97  # https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proportional_control
98  # Linear velocity in the x-axis.
99  vel_msg.linear.x = self.linear_vel_x(goal_pose)*self.direction(direction)
100  vel_msg.linear.y = 0
101  vel_msg.linear.z = 0
102  # Angular velocity in the z-axis.
103  vel_msg.angular.x = 0
104  vel_msg.angular.y = 0
105  vel_msg.angular.z = 0
106  # self.angular_vel_x(goal_pose)
107  rospy.loginfo("linear velocity Move x --> %f goal distance --> %f",vel_msg.linear.x,self.euclidean_distance_x(goal_pose))
108  # Publishing our vel_msg
109  self.velocity_publisher.publish(vel_msg)
110  # Publish at the desired rate.
111  self.rate.sleep()
112  # Stopping our robot after the movement is over.
113  vel_msg.linear.x = 0
114  vel_msg.angular.z = 0
115  self.velocity_publisher.publish(vel_msg)
116  self.velocity_publisher.publish(vel_msg)
117  self.velocity_publisher.publish(vel_msg)
118 
119  def rotate(self,target_deg,func,topic:str):
120  while(True):
121  rospy.loginfo("target={%F} current:{%f}", target_deg,math.degrees(self.pose.theta))
122  if(self.check_angle(target_deg)):
123  func(3,topic)
124  break
125  if(target_deg > math.degrees(self.pose.theta)):
126  func(2,topic)
127  time.sleep(0.05)
128  func(3,topic)
129  time.sleep(1)
130  if(target_deg < math.degrees(self.pose.theta)):
131  func(1,topic)
132  time.sleep(0.1)
133  func(3,topic)
134  time.sleep(1)
135 
136  rospy.loginfo("reached")
137  func(3,topic)
